company_context: Global Leader of Cybersecurity Solutions and Services | Fortinet ACCELERATE 2026 Mandalay Bay Convention Center | Las Vegas, NV | March 9 - 13 Fast-Forward Innovation! Join the Top Customer and Partner Event of the Year! Register Now Pre-Conference Workshops Born Integrated. Built Intelligent. Only FortiAI. Transform security from reactive to predictive—where unified architecture enables AI to anticipate, adapt, and neutralize threats at machine speed Learn more Get the FortiAI Solution Brief See and Protect Everything from Code to Cloud Get 360-degree cloud defense-in-depth protection against today’s threat and risk vectors Learn more 2026 Cloud Security Report News Latest from Fortinet Fourth Year in a Row: Fortinet Named a Gartner Peer Insights™ Customers’ Choice for Endpoint Security Platform Fortinet earns an incredible 4.8 out of 5 rating and 98% willingness to recommend—one of the highest ratings in endpoint security. conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, Dr. Lee. My name is Alex, and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a leading provider of data processing solutions, and I came across your company while researching attendees at the Fortinet ACCELERATE 2026 conference. I noticed that you're the CTO, and I'd love to discuss how our solution can help you enhance your cybersecurity infrastructure.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (skeptical) Ah, another sales call. What makes you think we need your data processing solution, Alex? We're already invested in Fortinet's suite of products, and I'm not sure how DeepData AI fits into our existing infrastructure.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand your skepticism, Dr. Lee. However, our solution is designed to complement existing security systems, including Fortinet's. DeepData AI uses machine learning to analyze vast amounts of data, providing predictive insights that can help your team stay ahead of emerging threats. I'd love to schedule a demo to show you how our solution can integrate with your current setup and provide a more comprehensive security posture.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (objection) I'm not convinced. We've already got FortiAI, which seems to be doing a great job of anticipating and adapting to threats. Why do we need another AI-powered solution? What's unique about DeepData AI that would make it worth considering?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's a great question, Dr. Lee. While FortiAI is an excellent solution, DeepData AI focuses specifically on data processing and analysis, providing a deeper level of insight into your organization's data. Our solution can help identify potential security risks that may not be immediately apparent, such as data exfiltration or insider threats. Additionally, our solution is designed to be highly scalable and can handle large volumes of data, making it an ideal fit for organizations like yours that are already invested in Fortinet's ecosystem.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (still skeptical) I see. Well, I'm not sure if we're ready to add another solution to our stack just yet. What kind of ROI can we expect from implementing DeepData AI, and how does it compare to other solutions on the market?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand your concerns, Dr. Lee. According to our case studies, organizations that have implemented DeepData AI have seen an average reduction of 30% in threat detection time and a 25% decrease in false positives. In terms of ROI, we've seen customers achieve a return on investment of 3-5 times their initial investment within the first year of implementation. I'd be happy to provide more detailed information and case studies to help you better understand the value proposition of DeepData AI. Would you be open to a follow-up conversation to discuss further?
